inclusion.criterion: Newly diagnosed, previously untreated Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia (ALL) or lymphoblastic lymphoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Zubrod performance less than or equal to 3
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Adequate liver function (bilirubin </= 3.0 mg/dl unless considered due to tumor)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate renal function (creatinine </= 3.0 mg/dl, unless considered due to tumor)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Adequate cardiac function as assessed by history and physical examination
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: No active co-existing malignancy with life expectancy less than 12 months due to that malignancy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Active co-existing malignancy with life expectancy less than 12 months due to that malignancy
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has Burkitt's lymphoma, but no active co-existing malignancy with life expectancy less than 12 months.
